text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews If it’s about lives why aren’t you helping Governors get testing up and going? And why are you robbing and stealing PPE earmarked for and paid for by the States? You have made the Fed a frigging drug cartel.
https://t.co/KjcuaHAqFK
